body.name: Background Details
body.body: The Dragonborn were on the old world, before the Demigods came to Dekatreis. The wielder of the Book of Creation, Kavara, was a Dragonborn herself. When she made her people on Dekatreis, she granted them special boons as a token to her heritage, and expanded their bloodlines as well.

body.name: Bonus Languages
body.body: At 1st level, if your Intelligence score is 14 or higher, you can also select one of the following languages: Dwarven, Elven, Gnomish, Goblin, Jotun, or Orcish.

body.name: Darkvision
body.body: You can see in darkness and dim light just as well as you can see in bright light, though your vision in darkness is in black and white.

body.name: Elemental Blood
body.body:
You were descended from a dragon that had the inherent magic of an element in their blood. Choose one of the following damage types: Fire, Cold, Electrcity, Poison, or Acid.

You gain a Breath Weapon arcane power according to the "Heritage Powers" list below related to the damage type you have chosen.

body.name: Fire Breath
body.body:
Casting: Somatic Casting
Area: 15-foot cone
You call upon the blood of your draconic ancestors and exhale fire from your mouth that deals 1d8 fire damage. Each creature in the area must attempt a Reflex saving throw.
Success: The creature takes half damage.
Critical Success: The creature takes no damage.
Failure: The creature takes full damage and 1 persistent fire damage.
Critical Failure: Double damage and double persistent damage.
Heightened (5th) The damage increases by 1d8, and the persistent damage increases by 1.
